pkgmetadata.longdescription: ### A python library for geospatial processing based GDAL and Google Earth Engine=======================Installation-----```bashpip install geospace -U```To Do------ Time series extration using Google Earth Engine.Pull requests are encouraged!License-------This is free and unencumbered software released into the public domain.Anyone is free to copy, modify, publish, use, compile, sell, ordistribute this software, either in source code form or as a compiledbinary, for any purpose, commercial or non-commercial, and by any means.
